settings.text:
At UMEVO, we prioritize the security of your personal and payment information. We employ robust security measures to protect your
data throughout the payment process. Rest assured that your credit card details and personal information are handled
with the utmost care and are never shared with third parties.
We offer multiple convenient payment options to complete your purchase. You can use any of the following methods:

We accept Visa, MasterCard,
American Express, Discover, and JCB.

Available for quick and secure payments
on compatible mobile devices.
Please note that we can only accept one payment method per order.
We offer multiple convenient payment options to complete your purchase. You can use any of the following methods:
If your payment fails to process, the order will not be completed. You will need to place a new order. To ensure a smooth transaction, please verify the following information:
• Card Information: Confirm that the card number, expiration date, and billing address are all correct.
• Security Code: Accurately enter the 3-digit security code (CVV) on the back of your card.
• Contact Information: Ensure your phone number and email address are correct. If shipping to a business address, please include your name.

If your payment fails to process, the order will not be completed. You will need to place a new order. To ensure a smooth
transaction, please verify the following information:

If your payment fails to process, the order will not be completed. You will need to place a new order. To ensure a smooth
transaction, please verify the following information:

For customers using international bank cards, the final transaction amount may vary slightly due to exchange rates applied by your bank. Additionally, your financial institution may charge international transaction fees. These charges are not determined or collected by UMEVO, and we are not responsible for them. For more information, please contact your bank directly.

To protect our customers, some orders may undergo a verification process. We may contact you to confirm that you are the authorized cardholder or that the order details are legitimate. If payment information cannot be verified, UMEVO reserves the right to cancel the order. In such cases, a full refund will be issued immediately through the original payment method.

If a PayPal dispute is initiated before your order ships, PayPal will withhold payment. This will cause us to hold your order processing. To avoid delays, we kindly ask that you resolve the dispute directly with PayPal so that your order can proceed to shipment.
If you have any payment-related questions or encounter any difficulties, please feel free to contact our customer support team.
